review: I‚Äôve recently got into cryptocurrency trading over the last few months and binance by far is the best free platform to use. Yesterday morning before my early shift at work I went to set a buy limit on a currency incase it went down during my shift but with me being very tired I accidentally set the buy limit at 1.65 instead of 1.165; Instantly I lost 300 pounds on my investment due to my own carelessness and I was deeply upset. To my delight when I opened the app today I still held my crypto which was worth 300 pounds less than I initially had due to my error but I always held 300 pounds worth of USDT which Binance generously gifted back to me after clearing seeing the mistake I made. This isn‚Äôt the first time they‚Äôve taken care of me and their security features and compatibility with crypto wallets makes Binance the clear cut choice out of the apps available to begin trading with cryptocurrency in my opinion.
title: Amazing customer service!

review:
This is a good exchange as it offers a wide range of coins not available on one of the other platforms I use. It has a good newbie option and more detailed platform for more experienced users. Things generally went okay for a month until I fast-paid some funds from my bank account that did not arrive in my Binance account. Usually funds arrive within the hour. However this one deposit did not arrive. Over the following 5 days of following up with email and getting repeated automated email responses, I‚Äôve had to join a queue with 700+ people on a list to chat with customer support after dealing with a rubbish chatbot. Wait time 2hrs 30 minutes. 
Problem not resolved, as they cant find my funds even though it has left my bank. So I was told to go to my bank which I‚Äôve now done and awaiting for some sort of resolution. Seems ridiculous that they seem to be able to have a still flawed system for dealing with this (search on Reddit shows this is not an isolated incidence and other cases happens around the same time). A long way to go before achieving a higher score. Potential loss of customers as a result as well.
title: Good interface but really poor customer support when your funds don‚Äôt appear

review:
AVOID AT ALL COST. MONEY GRABBING SCAMMERS. I downloaded binance after reading some reviews online and thought I will give it a try. After passing all the verification it asked for, I decided to deposit my monies in to trade. They offer a FASTER PAYMENT option which enables traders to transfer monies to their designated account in Uk and supposedly start trading straight. 
After being confirmed through their hellishly long verification process and getting confirmation from their relevant team that the monies have hit their account and it‚Äôs in process. This all happened on 08 feb 2021. I could see on the portal that the money I sent is in process and to date it‚Äôs processing. 
In the process I tried buying crypto through 3 different bank cards and accounts which binance wouldn‚Äôt allow. Since that day I‚Äôve been trying to reach their support team and there is no way one can get connected to a human there. Opened about 100 tickets and no reply to even one. 
I spoke about this atrocity and rubbish experience on Reddit and one of their team members blocked me from messaging them. On doing further research , a lot of people are talking of the same thing and a very similar experience. Please avoid at all cost.
title: AVOID AT ALL COST. NO SUPPORT FROM TEAM. ABSOLUTE JOKE TO TRADE WITH

review: I downloaded this trading app a few weeks ago and deposited money without any problems. Then I was asked to verify my account and it kept coming back as failed. After trying to do so for a number of times, I sent an appeal video. I was told I would hear back within 5 working days. It has now been well over 5 working days and I still haven‚Äôt received verification. I am not able to withdraw funds I have on the account until this is done. The customer service chat that is meant to be ‚Äò24/7‚Äô, is just an automated bot that sends back generic responses. Speaking to an actual person is impossible! I have a message to say I am being transferred to an agent but after a few hours of waiting, I am still stuck in the same position. This is quite possibly the worst trading app around and I would not recommend anyone downloading it! I just want to withdraw my funds at this stage, so I can go elsewhere. Terrible app, terrible service and horrendous customer support! It‚Äôs all a pack of lies that they have 24 hour support service. Do not download and definitely don‚Äôt deposit any money into this joke of a company!
title: Worst Trading App Ever! Do not download

review: Ive just downloaded Binance as I usually use another app. In order to buy any crypto, I HAVE to consent to them sharing my biometric info, source of ‚Äúwealth‚Äù, bank card info, address etc. I can understand them needing to confirm my identity for themselves but why do they need to share my biometric data & a whole list of personal info with God knows how many other companies??? Next they‚Äôll be asking me when I last had a pee or what I had for dinner last night. Binance seems like it could be a decent little app (although it doesn‚Äôt have a lot of the crypto I‚Äôm looking for) but I may just delete my account before I even get a chance to use it. Just be careful folks - I‚Äôve been scammed in the past & ever since I started using a similar well known app (which didn‚Äôt ask for as much detailed info as Binance does), I‚Äôve been plagued by constant dodgy phone calls (8-10 calls daily) so I‚Äôm VERY apprehensive about allowing Binance to use & sell even more detailed info on me, when I HAVE to give them consent to do this in order to use the app.
title: BE CAREFUL FOLKS!!!

I AM VERY IMPRESSED with the way they acted and from now on will be using only Binance card. Screw the banks future of finances is here. Thank Binance you guys rock! Highly recommended. üôåStop using banks start using Binance. Additionally you will get 2% cash back for any purchase if you stake just 1 Binance coin.

Few tips: 

If you have a problem with them don‚Äôt open 100 tickets just wait patiently they will reply. I used Binance for over a year and never had a problem.

title: NS

review:
This is my first review ever. Normally nothing bothers me enough to write a review but congrats Binance. Your service was so overwhelmingly terrible you have the honour of being my first review. 
Not once in the T&C‚Äôs do they mention they will randomly shut down the withdrawal of YOUR OWN money. What I assumed would be a day or two has now gone over a month of me being unable to withdraw my money. 
Their solution? ‚ÄúConvert you cash into crypto and sell via P2P‚Äù what this does mean? Ah yes the conversion of my cash will mean that Binance earns more money in fees. Conversion that I shouldn‚Äôt have to undergo as their is no valid reason I shouldn‚Äôt be able to take money out (and no estimate when this will end). 
This company is a despicable money grab and has no value for how their prevention of withdrawing your own money may affect someone‚Äôs life. 
The only way for them to understand is to stop them receiving money to begin with and boycotting Binance. Trust me there are better crypto apps out there. AVOID BINANCE.
title: Shambles

title: Updated Review

review: Binance is still the best platform for trading crypto, it has the lowest fees, great UI//UX and now great opportunities to earn by stacking in the savings account. The only drawback I found after years was of using it is its awful customer service. They are unresponsive and if you are lucky contacting them after weeks of waiting for an answer, their answers are automated, unhelpful and un effective, making the whole experience super frustrating. I don‚Äôt get why don‚Äôt they improve in that regard. If they did, they would immediately put away all attempts of competition with great customer service getting Binance users as its happening now.
title: Great platform, horrible customer support

review:
I got the app and hoped to build a diverse portfolio and started buying crypto direct through Binance. Bit of a mistake on my part trying to buy multiple different coins for about ¬£15 each, this set of fraud detection. 

Fair play, I submitted my appeal, gave them all my personal details required. 3 days expected reply time, great... except it‚Äôs not, because I submitted my appeal 12 days ago and haven‚Äôt had a reply. Don‚Äôt worry though, my payments cleared days ago, doesn‚Äôt matter to Binance, card still blocked.

 I try out live chat, but the queue is 350 long, okay fine, set my phone not to go to Lock Screen to stay connected. Oh no, they already thought about that, every 5 minutes or so they try to disconnect you while waiting. Cheeky, but fine, I‚Äôll play your game, I keep an eye on my phone and keep pressing buttons to show I‚Äôm waiting. But no, that‚Äôs not good enough, the app glitches and kicks me out the queue.

So I send an email to support, I‚Äôm now on my second email templated reply. My first reply received suggested I use a new bank card!

Anyway, app is decent to use but make a large fiat deposit to your wallet to build a portfolio or enjoy watching yourself get locked out of using it while shouting into the void that is their customer support.
title: Blocked my card, no response

review:
Hi everyone, I‚Äôm Moe, I‚Äôm a black doctor working in the UK, and let me share with you my racist experience with Binance. 
So I wanted to get into the Crypto world, I saw adds for this app and I was like I‚Äôm going to download it and start my journey. Everything was going smooth but then, last thing I expected happened! They wouldn‚Äôt verify my account because of my nationality? Can everyone believe that? Customer service said ‚ÄúSanctions against Sudan‚Äù okay I am not Sudan, What do i have to do with it? I‚Äôm not even living in Sudan? But oh wel, let‚Äôs make everything more complicated for the black guy, let‚Äôs not give him equal rights! Very disgusting!
 I uploaded a legitimate ID from the United Kingdom, but no, they said because I‚Äôm Sudanese, Because of my race and nationality??!
I‚Äôm absolutely going to spread this everywhere, I‚Äôm aware of Equality act 2010, and I will certainly do everything I can to stop this discrimination!
title: Disappointed and disgusted

review:
When I opened my account I used my spouse name as it is my what I use on a daily basis. Nevertheless my passeport and bank card also display my maiden name. When I submitted my passeport, the name allocated to my account was my maiden name and therefore I could
Only use a bank card or bank account displaying only my maiden name which I don‚Äôt have. Yes they determine the name on the card and bank account you cannot change that!  I contacted the support twice and explained the situation, they twice refused to sort it out. I then contacted the chat and despite sending again a copy of my passeport and explaining the situation, they asked me to send a video of me holding my passeport and reading some stupid stuff. I ended up deleting my account. Pure waste of time. If they cannot sort out such a basic issue, I‚Äôm not going to rely on them to deal with my bitcoins.  Ciao ciao
title: Unable to use my account as unable to change my name

review:

The interface is also very clunky and unless you‚Äôre an experienced trader you almost need someone to talk you though how to use it. There are tutorial videos and help pages but they‚Äôre very wordy and not really helpful unless you already know everything. Not saying the app should be gamified but it‚Äôs not  really changed in the 4 years I‚Äôve used it and it could definitely use an overhaul. review: When you complete basic verification they tell you that you will have a withdrawal limit of 2 btc per day. Later on when you put all your money into the app they will decrease your withdrawal limit to 0 with no warning to take out your money. I spoke to multiple people in customer service and none of them helped me, they said I was warned by email but I didn‚Äôt receive any email. They then said that I made a account that accepted the terms and conditions, so I asked them to show me where in the terms and conditions it says they can randomly decrease my withdrawal limit to 0 with no reason or warning after I invest all my money into the app. So they sent me a line in the terms and conditions that basically said they can do what ever they want with my account. So now my money is trapped in this app. Don‚Äôt download, use Coinbase or some other app.
title: They trap your money, this is the worst app

review: I deposited ¬£250 on binance and everything was fine, when I tried to withdraw from my account My phone app and the website both started crashing. I was stuck verifying my account over and over for 2 hours straight. However they did finally send my money and I received it within an hour. This lead me to believe that binance was just having a network error so I  went back on then tried to deposit more and I was met with the fact I am now temporarily suspended. I appealed and was approved to I deposited another ¬£50 on binance. Now I‚Äôm met with another temporary suspension that I cannot appeal as it says I already have one out. I would say Avoid this app. For me it‚Äôs not much, I can only imagine how frustrating that would be if it did that with more money in the account
title: Very glitchy , hard to withdraw

review:
Used to love this app but I have since moved to another platform because I can‚Äôt get access to my account. Most UK credit cards don‚Äôt work and will fail, all my debit cards I once used are now no longer supported, so I can‚Äôt buy crypto with cash.

If you manage to overcome that, the anti money laundering checks require so much granularity it‚Äôs almost impossible to get through, and really time consuming. I used their automatic passport reader on my passport, instantly came back rejected. Selfie of me was rejected even though it‚Äôs clearly me. Next they want proof of address via a utility bill with name on it. But like most normal people in the 21st century I get my utilities through email so don‚Äôt have a letter to the house within the last three months. So I‚Äôm stuck out of my account. Cheers binance
title: Used to be good, now strangled by restrictions

review:
I‚Äôve been paying into Binance for over 6 months now, buying coins and holding. Along came the day I finally wanted to sell all my coins and withdraw my full profits. What Binance fails to tell you is that they only support withdrawal via VISA and only a select number of unknown banks, most mainstream banks are NOT supported and thus, you are physically unable to withdraw your own funds, after contacting support binance told me I had to re-purchase coins and sell them in the P2P trades in order for the money to be withdrawn to my chosen bank. 

How convenient, they won‚Äôt allow me to withdraw funds directly because my bank isn‚Äôt supported (Barclays UK), but instead, purchase MORE coins, then sell P2P and by miracle, my bank will then be supported. 

Their support chat was useless and the whole structure is a scam to keep your money in their system. 

Not to mention whenever Binance feels people are about to panic sell a coin, they remove the option to sell, this is not a joke - read some other reviews, Binance tries to manipulate the market by preventing users from cutting their losses. 

Binance, you‚Äôre a shambles of a company and the fact you‚Äôve made it this far is beyond me.

DO NOT USE THIS APP.
title: WITHDRAWAL SCAM

review:
FOR UK USERS - This platform has a sinister secret: once your money enters, there's no escape unless you engage in trading. You're coerced into a peer-to-peer system, unable to close your account or retrieve your funds. It's a virtual theft, leaving you powerless.

Customer service offers hollow reassurances, denying any restrictions on fund withdrawal, but in reality, they offer no help. They expect you to stand idly by while they hold onto your money.

Beware, for this platform preys on the unsuspecting. It's a chilling cautionary tale, urging utmost vigilance in navigating the treacherous waters of financial transactions.

BASED on all the negative news of Binance within the uk , all banks are no longer supporting linking to your account  so your existing funds in effect cannot be transferred out and thus stolen. Think long and hard before dealing with this platform , there are better , more secure and honest alternatives.
title: The financial trap - Unveiling a menacing platform

Just a broken application waste of time

review:
This app works well for the most part except in the following circumstances:

1) when Elon tweets that he loves Bitcoin or doge and the app crashes and you miss the boat 

2) when you trade any of cryptos and buy at a price markedly higher than stated on the platform and then sell back to the platform at a markedly lower price than stated.  It is nigh on impossible to make profitable trades unless the change in value of the currency from purchase to sale is >5% 

3) you try to withdraw money from the app and are subjected to a 1% fee which actually works out to be 1.5% 

Thus far I have made good bets on the cryptos the app allows you to purchase but have realised very little profit as a result of the unknown fees and stated price : purchase price and stated price : sale priced ratios

review:
Binance is user unfriendly, your customer support needs a major improvement. It would be much better for your system to support all enquiries concerning difficulties using your system and help in buying cryptos. It would even be better if there is someone you can communicate directly with and not to communicate with an ibot. I understand your need to keep costs down and earn more profit but PLEASE HELP us by providing us with a top of the range and a just customer services similar to that of Hargreaves Lansdown a company based in the UK. Their support system includes 3 different telephone numbers to different departments which includes their HelpDesk and their Stockbrokers. This company provides 100 percent fantastic customer services, it is a pity they do not operate also as a crypto exchange. 
I had difficulties sending my XRP to my wallet because your system asked me to provide a ‚Äútag‚Äùnumber. I was not able to do this. I searched all areas to find help but up till now I have found no help but interestingly I came across many people online experiencing the same problem. There are many other cryptos that is not listed under your ‚Äúbuy with debit or credit card‚Äù that I would like to buy that I cannot buy due to your user unfriendly system. I often have to turn to UTUBE for help but i do not always find all the help that I need because they will be talking about USBINANCE which is different to UK set up BINANCE exchange online, they have slightly different features which can be a major barrier for those based in the UK please help and make your system more user friendly. Also your system only allow you to view the current value of six of your cryptos. It then tells you that you have 3 plus to which you cannot access their current values. PLEASE HELP.

review: Thanks
title: Good

review:
Terrible company. Might as well burn your money. 

I lost my job over covid. 
String of bad luck. 
Had $150 left in my crypto, put it into a futures order on BNB. Binance‚Äôs crypto. 
Within a day it had jumped to a record level. 

I had made over $5000. I honestly couldn‚Äôt believe it. I could restart my life. 

However when I tried to put in an order to sell. Nothing would appear. At this point I could see my money slowly getting less and less. So I tried again. Nothing. The tracker was working so internet was ok. 
Then all of a sudden my sell orders went in. My order was now a short. 
Put in an order to just cancel it out. 
Nothing. 

Later. Some of the orders were going through but from earlier. But now I couldn‚Äôt see them. I had to try and guess what orders were going through. None of the orders to settle would appear. The slider and pull down menus would stick. Creating incorrect orders I now couldn‚Äôt see. 

The help / chat box said ‚Äúhelp‚Äù it did not exist. 

Then I see there an announcement that there are network issues on the futures network. Also weeks later it‚Äôs shown there were bugs in the app. 

Not surprising I lost all my $5k

I showed Binance screen shots, told them to look up the futures network issues at that time, asked about reports of app bugs. 
My response was after 3 months of messages. Sorry. We can‚Äôt help. 

They really really don‚Äôt care about you. Just to take your money. Their system and app broke, and cost me $5k 
Their response was. It was potential profit they can not be held responsible. As I made lots of orders it shows there was no problems. I couldn‚Äôt make correct orders. Orders made were not visible. 

If you go on reddit. They have a team to delete messages that describe systems issues, app issues, lost money. They may leave up one or two. But mine were deleted, reposts were deleted and I was told if I continued to post about my issues I would be banned from their group. Others I messaged were in the same boat some losing much more than me. I would check the next day and their posts were gone too. Imagine having a team that doesn‚Äôt help but deletes message showing the company in a bad light. 

Do not use this company. 
This is your money. Do you really want a company that if the network crashes and the app stops working just say. Sorry. Can‚Äôt help? If your bank turned round and said. After their network wasn‚Äôt working and app was glitching, sorry all your money is gone. There is nothing more we can do. Then have no customer service in place. You reach out of social media and they delete your posts. What would you do? 

It‚Äôs not until this happens that you wished you‚Äôd had never used Binance
title: Terrible company. Might as well burn your money

review:
I invested $15000 in BTC through Binanace 

Tried to withdraw it to an interest bearing account 
1 month later and a dozen emails from customer support where they robotically repeat the same request 
Still no withdrawal
Thankfully BTC price is moving up 
If it were the other way around I would be sooo livid right now 

I proved my identity as requested, by holding up my Passport with a dated selfie

They asked me for TXID details for a transaction I made in 2017
It is now 2020 
Having been through five platforms searching for the TXID 
I cannot find which Transaction this relates to on any platforms I have used previously 

They are basically holding my BTC against my will 

DO NOT USE BINANCE if you appreciate financial sovereignty 
And this is what BTC is supposed to all be about !!!

ABSOLUTE NIGHTMARE AND STILL ONGOING
